Method Detail

create

public static MockNinjaProperties create(String... args)
Create a mock ninja properties, with the given args as the properties. The arguments must be in key value pairs, every second argument being the value for the key name in the previous argument.

Parameters:
args - The key value pairs.
Throws:
AssertionError - If an odd number of arguments is supplied.

createWithMode

public static MockNinjaProperties createWithMode(String mode,
                                                 String... args)
Create a mock ninja properties, with the given args as the properties. The arguments must be in key value pairs, every second argument being the value for the key name in the previous argument.

Parameters:
mode - The mode
args - The key value pairs.
Throws:
AssertionError - If an odd number of arguments is supplied.
